document.full_text: little-used jason giambi clobbered three homers and drove in seven runs to power the colorado rockies to a 7-1 win over the philadelphia phillies in a battle of division leaders on thursday.
document.title: giambi takes his chance to fuel rockies win
lines_and_colors: little-used jason giambi clobbered three homers and drove in seven runs to power the colorado rockies to a 7-1 win over the philadelphia phillies in a battle of division leaders on thursday.
